examples: he was at the airport shortly before she was expected to arrive
the doctor will soon be here
we should have news before long

definitions.text: in a curt, abrupt and discourteous manner
examples: he told me curtly to get on with it
he said shortly that he didn't like it

definitions.text: in a concise manner; in a few words
examples: the history is summed up concisely in this book
the hem fell shortly below her knees
